body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Jordan Phillips and the customer's name is Rose Edwards.  The conversation is about Meta4 (a Martial Arts School ) and is a conversation about customer service.The customer is feeling {emotion}.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! My name is Jordan Phillips and I work for Meta4, a Martial Arts School dedicated to helping our students achieve their goals. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Rose! How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I have some concerns about my recent classes. I’m feeling a bit overwhelmed.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I understand how that can be. It’s important for us to address those feelings. Can you share with me what specific concerns you have?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I’m struggling with the new techniques and I feel a bit lost.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I appreciate your honesty, Rose. We want to ensure everyone feels comfortable. Can I ask for your date of birth to check your enrollment details?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it’s July fifteenth, nineteen ninety-five.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you! And one more thing, could you provide your zip code?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, it’s one two three four five.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for providing that information, Rose. We will ensure you get the support you need. Thank you for your time today!
